website_summaries.verdict: With a southwestern flair that adds a pop of color, this rug comes from a reputable manufacturer.
pros: Soft and attractive enough to use indoors
Made of nylon, which cleans up easily and can be vacuumed
cons: This rug may be slow to dry out after a heavy rain

customer_reviews.title: NOT OUTSIDE CARPET.  Complete fail for outside.
customer_reviews.text: Complete fail as an outdoor carpet. The description says, "Our unique marine backing application on our nylon outdoor rugs allows the water to pass through the rug instead of absorbing it". I put these outside yesterday. It lightly rained today and these are basically reservoirs for water. There is a rubber backing which I thought was strange when I opened them yesterday, but I went off the description and put them out. THESE ARE NOT OUTSIDE CARPETS. Don't be fooled!!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not a true OUTDOOR RUG
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, this is a beautiful rug. However, it should be made clear that it is for INDOOR or covered patio use ONL. It rained the first day I placed this rug on my deck and there is no way for it to drain with its rubber back. So the water collected and it was drenched. I had to take it up and hang it over my railing and at the end of the day, it was still wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummed this was not what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not an outdoor rug as advertised. Water is impossible to dry. So big it is a chore to lift and set out for drying. Would like a full refund. Stay away from this rug if you want it for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Fair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this area rug. It's soft, and pretty. I don't think I would trust it to be an outdoor rug....I don't think the backing would hold up. I absolutely love it in my living room. The colors compliment my hard wood floors. **update** While the carpet still looks nice, every time I vacuum another part of it starts to unravel. I'm not sure it's going to hold up for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: What a great budget rug!
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my massage table. I love how earthy but colorful it is, giving a little pizzazz to the room. It makes the floor noticably softer, obviously under my feet, but also to my knees and ankles. The padding yields good results. Its rubber backing makes it stay in place well. That being said, it's not a luxurious rug, it's not a true outdoor rug, and it's not unlike a kitchen mat. It's a $1.30 per square foot budget floor mat that looks good and functions well for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous - Dries quickly!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this rug is that I wish I had purchased the bigger one. I really like it a lot and it did get wet, actually soaked, and it dried right up. Because of the reviews claiming the rug never dried, I scrapped some of the water off and lifted it up so it could dry underneath just like you would with any rug or carpet. It didn't take long before it dried perfectly. So far, I really, really like this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Totally completes my outdoor room
customer_reviews.text: Colors in rug are darker than I thought they'd be but it will be good to help hide stains. It goes really well with the Better Homes and Gardens Azalea furniture I have! I bought the 5x8 size. The rug lays flat right out of the plastic too! Usually I'm using heavy objects to help the corners stay down when first unrolling a rug. This is definitely a rug for a covered porch.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I've kept it there
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug to use in my kitchen last winter when it was so very cold. I liked it so much I've kept it there. Prior to cleaning it, it did develop a couple of snags. I've easily hauled it out to the driveway and cleaned it with my Hoover carpet cleaner. Comes out very nice and dried in a day. The snags were made no worse nor developed any more due to the brushes on the Hoover. This rug fits my purpose and the price isn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi hall

customer_reviews.title: Not as pretty as pictures indicate.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty rug but not nearly as much as the pictures indicate. Very deep dull coloring where the pictures show it to be bright. It will work for my family room but I would call this somewhat drab and not very noticeable. Only had a few days so can't comment on durability. I will not return way too much trouble but I would not buy again. If you are looking for bright cheery colors this is not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Colorful rug provides endless options!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have this rug under our gazebo with our outdoor furniture set. The array of colors provides so many possibilities for accent colors, pillows, etc. we will see how it wears outside under our covered gazebo, but reviews look good for durability. So happy I bought this - decent price point too. Our backyard oasis is complete!
customer_reviews.author: maggiegypsy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for uncovered patios/decks
customer_reviews.text: Great for indoor and covered patios but not good for rainy days. It keeps a lot ( I mean a lot!!) of water and doesn’t dry easy. It can stay wet for days if you don’t do anything about it. Colors are pretty good and it feels soft to touch.
customer_reviews.author: metin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors for less money
customer_reviews.text: We have a great big downstairs den with a new vinyl/wood floor. Little money. So we got this rug in 5 x 7 I think it is and it's beautiful there. It's flat and doesn't attract mold. The few little "lumps"--just put a few books on there and help it to flatten. Colors are such a help to a plain room.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Darker
customer_reviews.text: A lot darker shade than I was expecting. Looks brighter in pics. But kept it, it'll grow on me 😆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this rug to brighten up my sunroom and it did. Seems good quality and layed nicely flat. It is in a protected location so I can't comment on durability or how weather proof it is. The price was right compared to similar rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Not for Outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is not meant for outdoors! It soaks up rain like a sponge and then takes several days to dry out. If you put this outside, plan on soaking up water with a shop-vac every time it rains or even gets a little wet. I bought this for an outdoor covered patio. When it rains hard, the water runs onto the patio and gets this rug wet. Then it takes ten days to dry out. I’ve only had it for six weeks and we already have to throw it away and get a new one. Do not buy for outdoors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Cheeba

customer_reviews.title: The colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this area rug last weekend to upgrade my front porch space. I purchased the 5’x8’ rug, it fits perfectly in the space, and the colors go beautifully with the furniture and decor I chose. I’m extremely happy with this area rug.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Mehaffie

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug for patio!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look that bright but when I took it outside and placed it on the patio, it really popped! It came early and the price was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Denese

customer_reviews.title: .Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of the rug however we have only used it once and with just gentle touching the outer seams have pulled away from the rug itself in two places. I am very careful with my things and was not miss-handling this in anyway whatsoever. Given that it’s for our camper and too big/annoying to return I didn’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Susan U.

customer_reviews.title: My Last Good Nerve
customer_reviews.text: Reviews say it is not good for the outdoors. It is also not good for any where in the house people plan to walk. We tried so many different pads under to hold it in place. We originally had it in the kitchen by the back door but when anyone walked on it, it would gradually get wrinkles and lumps- driving me crazy! So many pads and grips. We tried so many. Short of using double sided tape- not into THAT- couldn't keep it straight. It is now in the dining room. And I only see the lumps and wrinkles once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The colors !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable rug and much better quality than I expected Great for a patio area with southwestern decor So chic and vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Gordoneia

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not vibrant as represented in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I see one reviewer has already mentioned the colors in this rug do not look as bright as the one in the pictures. I want a summer rug to brighten up my deck. This rug is more of a fall rug. I'll use it in the fall but be aware that the colors in the pictures are not what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. BSA

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT for an uncovered area!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad rug... but it is definitely not for an open outdoor area unless you never get rain. It has a rubber backing. It held water. I was able to pick it up (just got the 5x7) and hang it over the deck and it did dry quickly, but I really don't want to have to move furniture and hang up every time it rains. I'll look for one where the water actually passes through the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Cappi Lipaj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug, I gives my deck an awesome fall look!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright colors; I don't like that it's really not an outdoor rug but I have a cover deck and that helps some except for when it rains really hard it gets soak and it takes awhile for it to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Dania

customer_reviews.title: Not outdoor usable!  Holds water!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as indoor outdoor. Rubber bottom. Holds water. Definitely not for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carter

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Exactly what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: This is closer to an indoor/outdoor rug but exactly what I needed in family room with this fun color scheme. Our large dog is aging and needed more coverage on the hard wood flooring as he is less steady. I did not want a lot of fluff or pile. It vacs up super easy and I am thrilled with the purchase. Great quality especially for the price. No odor as new, and Colors gave stayed true after several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks fantastic on my porch. It is on the part of my porch that is covered. I don’t know that it would be very durable in the elements over time. We really like it. I also think it would look nice inside as well. Bright colors, and it lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: Dana G

customer_reviews.title: Colors don't pop and the material may be too soft for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: This rug isn't quite as vibrant in real life as it is online. It's also an odd material for indoor/outdoor. I expected it to be a bit heavier/rougher. I'm not sure that it will last on my deck as I had hoped. If I had a covered patio, this would work, but on a deck, it's probably just too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: They match any decor style
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these indoor/outdoor rugs for my screened porch and liked them so much I bought 2 more for my front porch. All were 5x7. I love the kinda muted colors-I didn’t want a carnival effect with bright colors. They feel good on my bare feet. I’ve only had them for a few months so I can’t speak as to the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Madewell

customer_reviews.title: Room Size Rug
customer_reviews.text: I was positively thrilled at the quality of this rug. It looks fantastic and cleans like a dream. Any stains are quickly removed with just warm soap and water. Everyone remarks at how beautiful my room looks with this addition.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Goodman

customer_reviews.title: NOT an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is not for outdoor use. I bought it to use as the centerpiece for our patio furniture. It holds ALL rain and does not drain. Every time it rains I have to pull the rug down the patio steps so the rain will drain out of it. Otherwise when I step on it the retained rain water splashes up. I am going to have to by a different rug for the patio. For our purposes it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Spry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lay flat
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and it is a pretty rug. The colors are vibrant and go with my living room decor. The negative thing is that the rug corners will not lay flat and the side edges do not lay flat on the floor. Hopefully, it will eventually "relax" and flatten to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty but it kinda pills. I’ve only had a month and it’s not in an area of high traffic. I hope it lasts for a few years. But too soon to really evaluate.
customer_reviews.author: susan sutherland

customer_reviews.title: sharper colors than shone
customer_reviews.text: Trying to adjust to colors. Am really giving my opinion too soon as to durability.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colors
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected either I got the wrong carpet or colors on pictures from reviewers are not real
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my rug and it is absolutely awesome! I'm thrilled with how well it matches our new patio decor! Colors are a little deeper/darker than expected, but it could also be because it's under our covered pergola. Either way, the colors give us a lot of options if we ever want to change out the red accents! I also purchased these reversible pillows which also match perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but carpet snags easily
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but carpet snags easily. We have a medium size dog whose claws created 15-20 snags, some travel half the length of the rug. We have had many other living room rugs that have never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: keng

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Nice coloration....muted, not bright colors. Goes perfectly with my red patio furniture cushions. Can accent with pillows of any color. Love the non slip backing. Stays put on my covered deck. I do, however, roll it up when there is a bad storm to keep it from getting wet. I like it so much I am thinking of getting the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: Booklady107

customer_reviews.title: Very good rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. It feels so nice under my feet. Perfect for my outdoor porch. No fading and stayed soft.
customer_reviews.author: Terelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Accurate colors
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors goes with our southwestern theme here in Arizona. This is the base while we wait for patio furniture etc. I love it it came wrapped in plastic no box so it’s obvious what it is on your porch. I don’t know about durability yet. This is a 5x8 on an 8x12 patio
customer_reviews.author: pam eskridge

customer_reviews.title: this rug is in amazingly good condition to be on my back porch in all ...
customer_reviews.text: Three years later, this rug is in amazingly good condition to be on my back porch in all the elements. Would definitely recommend, especially for the price and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Weathers well.
customer_reviews.text: Has weathered both rain and sun well so far. True to colors shown. Actually got the deck and the lawn chair colors to go together!
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Rug works nicely on my back patio. We've had some rain and it dried well. The colors are a little brighter than I expected but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: KaDee

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this rug
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this rug. It is wearing well over the last four months that I've had it. However, even though it is "outdoor" it does not dry easily on its own. If it gets wet, it needs to be hung to dry as it has a rubber back. Or when rain is predicted, I just roll it up in front of my door so it is protected. I think if it laid there wet on the concrete, it would start to deteriorate. Anyway, still a beautiful color and I get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne A

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: The price is reasonable, quality good and colors beautiful. Perfect way to cover water stains on porch tile. Too new to report on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this with the intention of using it outdoors ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this with the intention of using it outdoors. It will keep the water in when it rains and it won't dry. You will need to remove it from the deck/patio each time and hang it to dry. I would change the description to read indoor only.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for my patio. I am so pleased with the colors. The pillow options are endless with all the colors in the rug. I choose a paisley pattern to accent along with solids.
customer_reviews.author: jb8284

customer_reviews.title: Not same color as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Rug is not the same color as shown in the picture advertised. The yellow/golden color is green, it’s not as summery as shown, more earthy tones. Good quality, not really an outdoor rug but will work under covered porch I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the rug long enough to rate its durability but the colors are sharp, and the rug is softer than most indoor/outdoor rugs. Looks great on our screened in porch.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Morton

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug. Vibrant colors. Ends roll up a bit... but was a quick fix with double-sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed&Highly_Favored

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Loved the rug but I wouldn't call it an outdoor rug. After a rain I have to hang it over the railing for it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than picture shows.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about durabiilty, I just put it down. Looks good. Light weigh. Packed well.
customer_reviews.author: Auntcyn9

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Great colors and fits perfect on my small patio. When it rains however, it tends to hold on to a lot of moisture for a couple of days but otherwise, very happy with this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love the rug color looks just like pic and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug color looks just like pic and it is in a very high traffic area and has a few pulls from dog but nothing I would send it back for, love the backing it's doing just what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer lover

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: This is not approprate for outdoor use. In rain, the water sits for long periods of time on the rug. There is no way for drainage, due to rubber backing.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Y.

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: Rug was well-packed and came promptly. Rug was obviously end of the roll and was white, not patterned in the corner. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice quality rug. Make looks good and colors are rich and lovely. Was so excited as it matched my new outdoor furniture and space perfectly. Unfortunately, the marine backing does NOT drain well as implied in the description. This was under an awning and the first time it rained it became a 200lb sponge. Hope I can get them dried out before my return deadline!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Copacetic
customer_reviews.text: This item is accurately depicted in the image--very nice. I appreciate that it doesn't require a non-slip rug pad due to its rubberized back.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Cute I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this outdoor rug, it compliments my porch so much
customer_reviews.author: Brandy27

customer_reviews.title: I love this rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. It doesn't feel like an indoor/outdoor-- so Im hoping this wasn't a goof i the labeling department. It will get some intense sun and rain this summer, thou on my back deck-- so we will see how it holds up. very thick rubber backing.
customer_reviews.author: WL

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft to walk on. Colors are strong but not vivid.
customer_reviews.author: PMW

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this rug so far, it does not slip around. We currently have it in our living room. It is not the softest rug but I did not expect that considering it is an indoor/outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Otteson

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I put this rug in my patio area & I get a lot of compliments on it. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Krod

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not super heavy-duty and the colors are muted as compared to the indoor carpet, but it's nice
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Loose weave so if you have a car or dog that scratches tart paws on a rug, this is not theobne for you. They fall apart Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn D. Facha

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug.
customer_reviews.text: The rug that I got was a darker color, and ended up being too small for my area. It was a bit thinner than expected. But I will get another one.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean and looks like it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put under dining table in kitchen over a slate tile floor. It is easy to clean and looks like it will hold up well. The colors are much prettier than the picture---softer and more muted. I was worried that it might be too bright, but it is really darker than it looks on the website with rich colors. Don't know how it would hold up as an outdoors rug.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Noble

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. It came well wrapped and delivered quickly. Use it in my kitchen, under my kitchen table and chairs. Compliments the colors in my kitchen and is just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug but not for outside
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rug, it’s just not for outside in my opinion. It’s way to thick for an outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: VV Will

customer_reviews.title: Pretty rug, does not drain
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on the underside does not allow this outdoor rug to drain, you have to hang it. Other than that, it's a very nice rug.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: this is advertised as suitable for outdoors. It should clearly say that it should remain under cover if it is outdoors. it is super absorbent and once it gets wet takes a very long time to dry. I threw it out as I specifically got it for a patio and it is not covered.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Not outdoor friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful rug, and priced well! However, the description is deceiving, because it is NOT good for outdoors unless under a cover or in an enclosed outdoor area. It soaks up rainwater and literally retains it for days! Not so pleasant for under a set of dining room patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This rug was great Had to return - because I measured wrong Did ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug was great Had to return - because I measured wrong Did not read my screen - was thinking 5x7 Colors are beautiful- very high end looking Would recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful and Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the porch. Cheerful, sturdy, and looks like it will last several summers. (I hope) Looks great with the Annie Westport Bench and Chair Cushions and Pillows.
customer_reviews.author: p.horwitz

customer_reviews.title: Rug will not hold up!
customer_reviews.text: This rug pulled within the first two days. I didn’t even have anything but two chairs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Preston

customer_reviews.title: Screened in porch rug!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to have a bright durable rug for our screened in porch. The size and color are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors! Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rugs for the money. Colors are bright. My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Barnett

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love this rug
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this rug, so many different colors to match with it. I leave mine outside and it seems way enough to clean. Paired with aqua cushions, orange candles and green lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Colors we were vibrant. Rug was durable and was outside through late fall.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: I like the rug (the colors are great
customer_reviews.text: I like the rug (the colors are great!), but the other reviewers are right - it soaks up water like a sponge. Next year I'll roll it up and store it for winter before the rains come. Summer / dry weather only outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: alderum

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: The carpet was vivid on its colors. Perfect for my outdoor area.
customer_reviews.author: Mismel56

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for an outdoor patio for fall. The colors are stunning. I was originally told it would arrive in a week but it arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: CCJ

customer_reviews.title: A very indoor ( outdoor ) rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug was so much more then I expected. We are using it on our patio, however; it is nice enough to use indoors. It has a very rich pile and feels wonderful to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft and nice. Just got it yesterday
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, soft and nice. Just got it yesterday, so it has some wrinkles. If I can get rid of them I would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: SuziQ

customer_reviews.title: not what looks like in the photo
customer_reviews.text: am returning this item, doesn't look like the photo, much darker colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size is not accurate -
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed and needed it right away. Cant deal with returning.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful, great for backyard
customer_reviews.text: Information for care not included. Rug is now wet and don't know what to expect if I shampoo carpet????? instructions shall be included
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Floriano Lupita

customer_reviews.title: Soaking wet rug
customer_reviews.text: This is not a outdoor rug when it rains it sopping wet and stays that way I have to hang it up to dry. Which is not easy to do because it is so heavy when wet. Very nice rug if you did not let it get wet. Just not what I was wanting for my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L. Teel

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: It says it is good for indoor/outdoor but it was a terrible buy for outdoor. When it rains the rug holds water and takes forever to dry. Would not recommend for outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colors! Perfect thickness
customer_reviews.text: Perfect colors! Perfect thickness! I put this in an area people enter from the pool area. It has kept very nicely and does not show dirt. Dries quickly and feels great under your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Angelyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Great rug- quality was there, and colors matched the ad. What sucked was this is in NO WAY an outdoor rug. We returned it. Do not buy if you intend to use outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug..Its on my deck... Everyone comments on it..:O)
customer_reviews.author: crafter

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but lasted one day before starting pulling in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but lasted one day before starting pulling in areas - Actually it's trash..rolled up after 1 day and it was inside. Have 5 yr old area rugs that look better than this after 1 day. Don't waste your $$'s, it's trash and not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Twins Gma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect patio rug and pillows

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rug, easy to clean. I used this in the basement. Keep the area clean and bright. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Trangirl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for outside use
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe this is advertised as indoor/outdoor. It most definitely is not outdoor. We have it on our deck, and it takes DAYS to dry after a rain. If you step on it water pools around your foot. Waste of money for outside use.

product_meta.title: Mohawk Home Avenue Stripes Indoor/ Outdoor Printed Area Rug, 7'6x10', Multicolor
product_meta.description: Size:7'6x10'The traditional stripe gets and update in this artist rendition that features bold color and blurred strokes. Perfect for a festive outdoor space, this design is sure to make a splash. These rugs are made from synthetic fibers that resist staining, fading, mold and mildew. Our outdoor rugs are made from nylon that resists staining, fading, and mold/mildew. Our unique marine backing application on our nylon outdoor rugs allows the water to pass through the rug instead of absorbing it, much like the carpet you find on boats. Printed on the same machines that manufacture one of the world’s leading brands of printed carpet, this rug is extremely durable and vibrant. This technology allows the use of multiple colors to create a rug that is wonderfully designed and applicable to any room in your home. Crafted completely in the USA, this rug is made from durable stain resistant nylon.
feature_bullets: VIBRANT PATTERN: Colorful contemporary décor throw rug adds a perfect accent piece
DURABLE AND FADE RESISTANT: Holds up under high-traffic spaces with kids and pets. Easy to clean surface keeps it attractive for years to come
IDEAL FOR INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Perfect for the living room, bedroom, office or for outdoor patios
STAIN RESISTANT NYLON: Easy to clean with mild detergent and water
MADE IN THE USA: Proudly made in the USA with imported materials

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars492 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Taking proper care of your rug will prolong its life and appearance. Vacuum your rug regularly to remove loose soil, taking special care when vacuuming fringe and edges. Some throw rugs, especially for bathrooms, can be washed in your home washing machine. Always comply with the manufacturer\u2019s recommended cleaning methods on the attached label to prevent warranty invalidation and damage to your rug. Have a professional deep clean your rug as needed. Several cleaning methods will work, but to prevent rapid resoiling of your rug, it is important to completely remove any residual cleaning agents.
